title: Trust M.C 100
author: Trust M.C 100
created_time: July 25, 2023, 10:43:13 AMLast edit: September 08, 2023, 11:34:19 AM by Trust M.C 100
content: ______________________________________________________⛤WEBSITE⛤ Twitter⛤TELEGRAM⛤ PITCH DECK FOR RE PARTNERS⛤ YOUTUBE ⛤ WHITEPAPER⛤Audit-PROP-TOKEN⛤______________________________________________________Token contact address: 0xEc202b99b5ac4c48f3864cF159369ed1368B62DA  🔸2,000 USDT worth of $PROP tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.🔸The bounty program was launched on 25 JULY 2023 and will run until  07 AUGUST 2023.🔸Tokens will be distributed to participants within 3 week after the end of the Bounty Campaign 🔸. All participants must join Trust M.C 100 Telegram Group, Telegram ChannelAnd Join BlockPark  Telegram Group Twitter Page🔸 Please ask your bounty-related questions in the  Trust M.C 100 .🔸KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.🔸Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. 🔸Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns🔸Negative Trusted Accounts not allow.🔸All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Twitter          40%Telegram      25% Reddit           15%TikTok or YouTube      20%    Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter         :   First 300 approved participate Telegram    :  First 200 approved participants. Reddit         : First 150 approved participants. TikTok or YouTube: First 80 approved participants.Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread Week: 1 (25/07-31/07)Week: 2 (01/08-07/08)Rewards:  1. 1000 - 3000 followers: 5 stake/week2. 3001 - 5000 followers: 7 stakes/week3. 5001 - 8000 followers: 10 stakes/week4. 8001+ - followers: 14 stakes/weekRules:  ▪️Must follow BlockPark  Twitter Page.▪️Must Join BlockPark  Telegram group .▪️ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 1000 followers.▪️Participants have to make 5 retweet & 2 new posts per week with project link otherwise you get rewarded zero[Maximum 1 post/Day]▪️Time gap between 2 posts needs to be 12 hours minimum.▪️Participants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every tweet & retweet.  Twitter Joining formRewards:2 stakes/par post Rules:▪️Must Join BlockPark  Telegram group .▪️Update your Telegram name  Your Name | BlockPark Ambassador.(Example: Trust M.C 100 | BlockPark Ambassador)▪️Replace your profile picture with  BlockPark.▪️Participants can only wear one project name at a time. ▪️Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. ▪️Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups▪️You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.   Telegram Joining formRewards: 1. Have more than 30 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 Karma: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 Karma: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10000 Karma: 5 stakes/weekRules: ▪️ Must Join BlockPark  Telegram .▪️Reddit account must be at least 2 month old with at least 10 posts and 30 karmas. ▪️Write weekly 3 post on own profile & 2 in others crypto subreddit group. (Maximum 1 post/day)▪️Post must focus on a topic relevant to The BlockPark.▪️Participants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every own post .  Reddit Joining formRewards:  1. Have more than 1000 views: 1 stake2. Have more than 2000 views: 2 stake3. Have more than 3000 views: 3 stake4. Have more than 5000 views: 5stakes5. Have more than 10,000 views: 10 stakesRules: ▪️Must Join BlockPark  Telegram group .▪️TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 200 followers or subscribe.▪️Videos need to be unique and have at least 1000 views. ▪️Videos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length. ▪️Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.▪️Participants have to shoot 2 unique videos  (minimum 1 video/week).▪️Participants must use $PROP #BlockPark #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in every video.  TikTok Joining formAll participants have to submit their weekly reports [ Twitter, Telegram Reddit ] on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. Pre-sale link: https://proptoken.com/PROP Token Presale is now LIVE!!! $PROP is backed by property revenue  Receive dividends in $PROP Tokens Enter referral code: MHhlNGMwNGVmMzU5YTFiOTEyMDc5ZDllMjc3MWIxZTgyYWJlNjNjYWJmFor a FREE PROP-NFT and a chance to win 2X PROP Tokens!Buy $PROP Here Each winner will receive $PROP NFT as a prize▪️For more information visit:Website.Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: [b] Twitter Campaign[/b]Spreadsheet No:Tweet Link1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Retweet Link1. 2. [b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Post Link1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Reddit Campaign[/b]Post on own profile:1. 2. 3. Crypto subreddit group1. 2. Proof Of Registration Format Code:PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns: BSC Wallet Address:  If the intention is honest, success will surely come
